name: Blast Them All
description:
SURVIVE ENDLESS WAVES. The growing waves of zombies challenge you and your dexterity. Keep your cool and put on a good show in the face of ever-increasing difficulty.



ADAPT TO CHANGING ARENAS. At the end of each wave, the arena you survived fades away to make way for your next challenge. Take advantage of the new layout, weapons and traps at your disposal and try to survive.



GO WILD AND SCORE MAXIMUM POINTS. Chain together elimination and ignite your gauge. Annihilate the zombies in your path and boost your multiplier before blasting your score. Push on and die proudly, with your name at the top of the leaderboard.



STRENGTHEN YOURSELF DURING AND BETWEEN WAVES. Collect upgrades and take advantage of their contents to perform during the round. After each special wave, choose upgrades from the store and make good use of your reroll tokens to adapt your upgrades and push your survival further.
